Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrdutrum] <Sri - Lead> Time Based

Example - If everyone votes at the same time within a shortspan of window, then our algorithm detects it and our moderators check if any manipulation is involved

Distribution

Example - If everyone votes in the same rating, excellent or bad, then our algorithm detects it and our moderators will check if any manipulation is involved

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdutrum] <Sri - Lead> Plagiarism checks to stop copied content

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdutrum] <Sri - Lead> Antispam checks to stop spam bots

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdutrum] <Sri - Lead> Google 2FA to stop spambots, mandatory for posting and voting
